channel.title: Django on IYP UK
channel.description: Recent content in Django on IYP UK

item.title: TDD Django Docker
item.description: What you will learn here We will go through the current Django tutorial with a particular focus on TDD and using Docker. This tutorial presents a polls application. Prerequisites Check you have the required software on your machine. $ docker -v Docker version 17.09.0-ce, build afdb6d4 $ docker-compose -v docker-compose version 1.16.1, build 6d1ac21 Getting started We will be running Django along with a PostgreSQL database.
